text: Since it was revealed that Tristan Thompson was allegedly cheating on Khloé Kardashian throughout her pregnancy, the Kardashians have begun expressing just how upset they are with the basketball player. A source has revealed to E! News, ` ` The family is very angry with Tristan and having a hard time coming to terms with Khloé trying to forgive him. They don't trust him and feel he won't change.'' Considering the number of allegations made about Thompson so far, this is a little unsurprising. However, E!'s source makes it clear that the Revenge Body star has yet to make up her mind about Thompson, with Khloé allegedly going ` ` back and forth'' with her feelings ` ` daily.''
